transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Halo? Haan Praveen ji.
Executive: Haan sir boliye.
Customer: Namaskar main Praveen Daraminda baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Haan. Aapne na main 96 wale number pe helpline number pe call kiya tha.
Customer: Haan. To koi concern aa raha hai batayenge ek baar.
Executive: Sir wo ye jo preview jo ek ek logon ne kisi ne to mujhe dala hai rating review to wo unknown person hai.
Customer: Haan. Pata nahi kaun hai to wo two star dala hai. To last time sir ne bola tha na ki 30 days ke andar hum hai to hum delete kar sakte hain.
Executive: Review ko.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay. To ye jo review hai ye matlab jinhone dala hai inse baat chit nahi hui aapki?
Customer: Nahi nahi wo nahi wo unknown person hai. Pata nahi kaun hai.
Executive: Unknown person hai?
Customer: Haan. Theek hai na Iliyas Ahmed naam kya naam hai inka?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Wo phone kiya to phone nahi uthate sir phone number diya tha madam ko maine. Screenshot bheja tha phone number phone nahi uthate pata nahi kaun hai. Abhi koi to aisa unknown person rehta hai na ki online pe aake ye kar diya. Unko pata bhi nahi rehta hai aisa rehte hain customer client.
Executive: Naam kya hai unka?
Customer: Maine screenshot bheja tha madam ko.
Executive: Achcha madam ko bheja aapne. To kya iska isko matlab iska kya karna hai remove karana tha kya aapko?
Customer: Haan wo remove karo na fir kyun kuch wo pehchan ka hi nahi hai na unknown client hai wo.
Executive: Unknown client kabhi baat chit aapki hui hi nahi hai hai na?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi baat nahi hui hai.
Executive: Theek hai to iske liye kya hota hai aise koi review aate hain to meri ek team baithti hai review rating ki. Unko hum report karte hain ki is tarike ke review unko aaye hain. Ek baar aap check kar lijiye inse koi baat chit bhi nahi hai koi lena dena nahi hai but inhone review de diya hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan. To team kya karti hai cross check karti hai usko karne ke time leke cross check karke agar unko lagta hai ki bhai sach mein koi connection nahi hai ya kai paas mein koi aisa connection nahi hai to uske jo bhi action leti hai wo team review and review rating wali team hi leti hai. To main itna help kar sakta hun ki aapki baat jo aapne screenshot bheja hai wo main waha pe pahuncha deta hun unko aur ek complaint raise kar deta hun review and rating mein isko aap dekh lo agar remove kar sakte hain to is tarike ka main waha pe update kar sakta hun. Baki aap Kajal ka number aapke paas nahi hai kya?
Customer: Kiska?
Executive: Kajal jo aapke account dekh rahi hai number nahi hai aapke paas?
Customer: Hai na unko unko send kiya tha na madam ko.
Executive: Achcha matlab isliye na directly baat kar liya theek hai kyunki abhi kya hai ki jaise aapne kal madam ko wo maine directly pehle mere ko pehle unko direct call kiya wo phone nahi utha rahe the unhone fir maine IndiaMART ko call kiya tab unhone phone uthaya aisa hai.
Customer: Achcha directly phone nahi uthaya chutti wale char tarikh ko kiya tha mujhe lag raha hai pata nahi abhi fir unko whatsapp kiya hai maine wo wo unhone bola tha ki hum karke denge to abhi kuch pata nahi kya kar rahe hain.
Executive: Achcha theek hai main samajh gaya to main iska na raise kar deta hun screenshot leke unse theek hai. Theek hai. Kajal ke Kajal se direct follow up le lijiyega theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai. Ye jo aapne 96 pe yahi concern hai iske alawa koi concern to nahi hai na?
Executive: Nahi nahi aur kuch nahi.
Executive: Theek hai main complaint raise karwa deta hun yaha se uske theek hai to ye kya hai wo ek ek review badhta jata hai na ab main main starting mein dekhta nahi tha abhi wo fir impact aata hai na.
Customer: Nahi review to aapka bahut achcha hai dekh liya maine kuch ek review hai agar wo galat hai to usko main theek karwa dunga. Nahi ye abhi kisi ne dala hai mere ko koi unknown person aake kuch bhi dal dega na to koi pata nahi abhi wo thoda sa main samajh leta hun competitor rehta hai koi ye rehta hai abhi pata nahi.
Executive: Haan haan haan haan haan.
Customer: Ek review ho gaya na ek tarah se apne hisab se hai na. Haan isse wo last time bhi hua tha lekin usko time khatam ho gaya tha. Unhone bola tha ki 30 day ke andar hi karna padta hai. Main abhi kiya hai lekin wo waha se bhi.
Executive: Haan?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan boliye na.
Customer: Ek baar usme push kar dijiye. Agar banji dekh lo. Hello?
Executive: Hello ji. Theek hai main samajh gaya. Nahi abhi karwa do sir kyunki wo 30 days fir complete ho jayega fir aap bologe ki abhi possible nahi hai aisa nahi hona chahiye na aisa nahi karna chahiye.
Customer: Haan. Nahi nahi main raise karwa deta hun usko theek hai okay. Rating review karwata hun. Baki 96 wala concern ek note kar sakta hun na main. Kaunsa call ke liye aap call ke liye aapne jo 96 pe kiya tha. Haan haan. Haan theek hai. Lekin ye problem solve karo sir mujhe koi concern karna problem to main taking hai main karwa main ja raha hun usko raise karne ho jayega main baat kar leta hun unse theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai meri baat chit ka feedback jarur dijiyega theek hai main help kar raha hun aapki yaha se. Haan haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a negative review from unknown person.

- Wants the negative review to be removed.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to raise a complaint.

- Executive will forward screenshot to review team.

- Advised to follow up with Kajal.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- review, rating, remove, unknown person
